animation_prompt: The black square, in the counterclockwise direction, is rotated over a period of 1 second through an angle of 90 degrees around its bottom left corner.
ground_truth_program:
o_1 = iota(Object, lambda o: color(o, "black") and shape(o, "square"))

exists(Motion, lambda m_1: type(m_1, "rotate") and direction(m_1, "counterclockwise") and magnitude(m_1, 90.0) and origin(m_1, ["0%", "100%"]) and duration(m_1, 1.0) and agent(m_1, o_1))

animation_prompt: Make the black square relocate to border the top edge of the black circle.
ground_truth_program:
o_1 = iota(Object, lambda o: color(o, "black") and shape(o, "square"))
o_2 = iota(Object, lambda o: color(o, "black") and shape(o, "circle"))

exists(Motion, lambda m_1: type(m_1, "translate") and post(m_1, s_top_border(o_1, o_2)) and agent(m_1, o_1))
